column4: ok i have a problem actually installing ubuntu. It boots from CD i get the options i hit install/run  then it gives me the rolling bar then about 2 mins after that it freezes
how is your video card hooked up to your monitor?  What type of connection (DVI-DVI, VGA-VGA, DVI-HDMI)?
do you know how i can view whats happening so i can see where its locking up?
